scope.description: A selector to match the scope name for completions to be enabled.

completions.description:
A list of completion objects with trigger and contents.
Alternatively a list of plain completion strings.

oneOf.description: A completion string that is at the same time a trigger for that completion.

trigger.markdownDescription:
**Completion Trigger**

The text the user must enter to match the completion.

It can optionally be followed by a tab character (`\t`) and an annotation.
Annotations are displayed on the right-hand edge of the completions popup,
and may contain any information the author deems useful.
Typically the annotations will be a word or two.

contents.markdownDescription:
**Completion Contents**

A text to be inserted when completion is triggered.

_Notes:_

- Supports the same string [interpolation features](https://www.sublimetext.com/docs/completions.html#snippet_variables) as snippets.
- Literal $ need to be escapedlike this: `\$`.

annotation.markdownDescription:
**Completion Annotation**

Annotations are displayed on the right-hand edge of the completions popup,
and may contain any information the author deems useful.
Typically the annotations will be a word or two.

details.markdownDescription: **Completion Details** A single line description of the completion. May contain the following HTML tags for basic formatting: _Example:_ ```js "details": "Wraps selection in a <b> tag" ```

kind.markdownDescription:
**Completion Kind Metadata**

The kind metadata for the completion.

If the value is a string, it must be one of: 

- `"ambiguous"`
- `"function"`
- `"keyword"`
- `"markup"`
- `"namespace"`
- `"navigation"`
- `"snippet"`
- `"type"`
- `"variable"`

_Example:_

```js
"kind": "function"
```

If the value is a 3-element array of strings, the must be:

1. A string from the list above, which is used by the theme to select the color of the kind metadata
2. A single Unicode character to be shown to the left of the trigger
3. A description of the kind, viewable in the kind letter tool tip, and the detail pane (when visible)

_Example:_

```js
"kind": ["function", "m", "Method"]
```

items.markdownDescription:
**Kind Category**

A highlevel category of a symbol kind,
which is used by the theme to select the color of the kind metadata.

It must be one of: 

- `"ambiguous"`
- `"function"`
- `"keyword"`
- `"markup"`
- `"namespace"`
- `"navigation"`
- `"snippet"`
- `"type"`
- `"variable"`

**Kind Icon**

A single Unicode character to be shown to the left of the trigger

**Kind Description**

A description of the kind, viewable in the kind letter tool tip,
and the detail pane (when visible).
